title: Bug 117981: Unable to select item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the selection is not registered on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view.

Observed Behavior: Upon the first attempt to select an item, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view instead of registering the selection.

Expected Behavior: The item should be selected upon the first attempt, without the focus jumping to a different node.

Note: Upon making a second attempt to select the item, it is successfully selected.
OB: Upon the first attempt to select an item, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view instead of registering the selection.
EB: The item is successfully selected upon the second attempt.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view. 
2. Attempt to select any item in the view.
